fields.name: Bet:
fields.value: Use during the evening phase, before results. Rank every player. You will receive Poker Chips based on their placement in evening results. For example, in a 5 player round: you rank them exactly, 5 Chips; if you rank them 1 place off (e.g. guessed 4 for the 3rd placer), 4 Chips; etc.

fields.name: Call:
fields.value: Trade in 7 Chips and increase your attack power by 1.0x tonight. This ability may be multitasked and performed multiple times in one night.

fields.name: Check:
fields.value: Trade in 7 Chips and increase the number of players you'll attack tonight by 1. This ability may be multitasked and performed multiple times in one night.

fields.name: Cash Out (Passive):
fields.value: Each night, you'll attack a random number of players (1, unless increased by Check) with 0.5x attack power (unless increased by Call). This is not affected by roleblocks.

fields.name: On The House (Charge 14%, Passive):
fields.value: Gain 1 Chip each time this passive charges.

fields.name: Lucky Streak (Passive):
fields.value: Triggered when you place in the top 7. Cash Out will be twice as likely to select players you could successfully attack.
